definitions.text: the sharp sound of snapping noises
glazed china with a network of fine cracks on the surface

examples: My Rice Krispies crackled in the bowl
his shoes were crunching on the gravel

definitions.text: to become, or to cause to become, covered with a network of small cracks
examples: The blazing sun crackled the desert sand

definitions.text: having the surface decorated with a network of fine cracks, as in crackleware
